title: Change Axis Direction in Matplotlib

meta.description: Learn how to change the axis direction in Matplotlib plots using the set_axis_direction() method. Improve your Python data visualization skills.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Python, Data Visualization, Axis Direction, Plotting, Jupyter Notebook
